articles.description: An estimated 65,000 fans as well as royalty join the triumphant England squad in London as they continue their Euro 2025 celebrations.
articles.title: Lionesses Euro 2025 parade: England fans join team for celebration in London

articles.description: Video footage emerges on social media of a confrontation between India head coach Gautam Gambhir and Surrey's head of ground staff, Lee Fortis.
articles.title: England v India: Gautam Gambhir involved in confrontation with Surrey ground staff over Test pitch

articles.description: World Rugby boss Alan Gilpin rejects Australia coach Joe Schmidt's claim that the decision around Jac Morgan's clearout at the end of the second Test against the British and Irish Lions contravened the sport's player welfare drive.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions: World Rugby boss rejects Joe Schmidt's clearout complaints

articles.description: Four people were killed when a gunman stormed a skyscraper on Monday evening and opened fire.
articles.title: New York gunman left note blaming NFL for brain injury, mayor says

articles.description: The World Cup is the next challenge on the horizon for England, so what might the team look like in two years and what are their chances of winning it?
articles.title: Lionesses: How are England placed for next World Cup in 2027?

articles.description: Only a week after turning professional, Lottie Woad is favourite for the final major of the year, the AIG Women's Open at Royal Porthcawl.
articles.title: AIG Women's Open at Royal Porthcawl: Lottie Woad targets win

articles.description: Aston Villa's Ollie Watkins and RB Leipzig's Benjamin Sesko are at the top of Manchester United's list of strikers if they decide to bring in reinforcements during the current transfer window.
articles.title: Manchester United: Ollie Watkins and Benjamin Sesko top of striker wishlist

articles.description: From Bihar to Birmingham, Akash Deep has come from humble beginnings and overcome family tragedy to make his mark in the India Test side.
articles.title: Akash Deep: India seamer's journey to Test glory

articles.description: Francisco Rodriguez Jr failed a drug test in Texas last December and received a 90-day suspension.
articles.title: Boxing: Francisco Rodriguez Jr failed drug test in America before positive test against Galal Yafai

articles.description: Australia complete a comprehensive 5-0 clean sweep against West Indies in their T20 series by winning the final match of their tour by three wickets.
articles.title: Australia compound West Indies misery with 5-0 win in T20 series
